siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
blogPost.body: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
blogPost.title: Ray.so by Raycast - Create beautiful images of your code
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 将你的代码变成精美的图片。从一系列的语法颜色中选择，隐藏或显示背景，并在明暗窗口之间切换。使用键盘快捷键来加快你的进程。由Raycast团队打造。
localize.tagline: 为您的代码创建美丽的图像

localize.description: 將你的代碼變成精美的圖片。從一系列的語法顏色中選擇，隱藏或顯示背景，並在明暗窗口之間切換。使用鍵盤快捷鍵來加快你的進程。由Raycast團隊打造。
localize.tagline: 爲您的代碼創建美麗的圖像

previous.excerpt: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
previous.title: Text Compare - Instantly see the difference between two pieces of text

localize.description: 文本比较可以让你立即看到两段文本之间的差异。按段落、单词或字符来比较文本。粘贴两段文字，Text Compare将突出显示在原文中插入或删除的内容。
localize.tagline: 瞬间看到两段文字之间的差别

localize.description: 文本比較可以讓你立即看到兩段文本之間的差異。按段落、單詞或字符來比較文本。粘貼兩段文字，Text Compare將突出顯示在原文中插入或刪除的內容。
localize.tagline: 瞬間看到兩段文字之間的差別

next.excerpt: 1. Save your team's repeated questions from Slack/Teams and provide access to everyone on the team. 2. Create a Subject Matter Experts Directory so that team members know whom to ask about what. 3. Let folks ask the external community of experts when needed.
next.title: Standuply Q&A - Internal Q&A platform for Slack or MS Teams

localize.description: 1. 从Slack/Teams中保存你的团队的重复问题，并提供给团队中的每个人访问。2. 创建一个主题专家目录，让团队成员知道该向谁询问什么。3. 让大家在需要的时候询问外部专家社区。
localize.tagline: Slack或MS Teams的内部问答平台。

localize.description: 1. 從Slack/Teams中保存你的團隊的重複問題，並提供給團隊中的每個人訪問。2. 創建一個主題專家目錄，讓團隊成員知道該向誰詢問什麼。3. 讓大家在需要的時候詢問外部專家社區。
localize.tagline: Slack或MS Teams的內部問答平臺。
